messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HOP here, sssend me a PDA for job changesss and the sssuch, i will be working in cargo ssso requessst sssuppliesss via requessst consssole, and i will persssionally sssee to it myssself. Have a good ssshift everyone.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A merchant has arrived in your sector. they are only a bit over brig. We are giving you all a break and permission to go trade and deal. concider it our gift.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Unknown. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.
